title: Gold steal
body: I was thinking a goldsteal item that plucks gold from the person you hit would be awesome for supports, maybe it will make people want to play support more?

replies.body: Losing gold is not a mechanic I would like to see in LOL.

I agree with Mere as this is not something I'd like to see in LoL. Also, supports already have low gold late game. Could you imagine Leona comes along with her tank masteries and only Relic Shield for most of her gold income, and you pop up as Karma and say "Sar ala sar, your item builds won't get far?"

> I agree with Mere as this is not something I'd like to see in LoL. Also, supports already have low gold late game. Could you imagine Leona comes along with her tank masteries and only Relic Shield for most of her gold income, and you pop up as Karma and say "Sar ala sar, your item builds won't get far?"

It ...rhythms!

>"Sar ala sar, your item builds won't get far?"

This made me laugh :D
It is true that it would be unbalanced for a lot of lane matchups, but like I stated it kinda already exists with spellthiefs etc.

That is a neat idea you have there. I'm guessing it would be an item similar to the spellthiefs item line{{item:3303}} {{item:3098}} {{item:3092}} except with the difference being harass actually loots gold instead of just granting it out of thin air.

The thing with support is its a "thankless role" when you get kills big banners go across the screen everyone knows how well you've done. There isnt any "OMG THE NOOB ADC WOULD HAVE DIED IF SUPPORT DIDNT HEAL \ SHIELD & SAVE HIS ASS" banners and notifications to players.

Or "Sona saved the entire team... PENTA SAVE!!!"
